channel.title: My fancy website
channel.description: Recent content on My fancy website

item.title: Engagements
item.description: I am generally available for speaking engagements in the greater Boston area depending of course on availability. I am willing to travel to speak depending on arrangements. I have been wokring in the technology field for over 20 years in a wide aray of industries and am happy to speak about the past, present and future of the industry as I see it. Topics I’m fairly passionate about: DevOps, Infrustructure design, IT teams management, Technology in Education and Researech.

item.title: About
item.description: With over 20 years in IT working in a wide array of industries. I see myself first and formost a technologist, a product of an up an coming digital age now working in the heart of the industry.
